r5.cam? Isn't it one or the other?

-haggie

r5 refers to the video and cam the audio. r5 are usually in movies dubbed russian which are released early over there in order to combat russian piracy. So they are often synced to an english audio source by p2p and scene groups, usually line audio from telesyncs. However if none is available, such as this case, cam audio is used

When Ricky Gervais casted 'The Douche' for US 'The Office', I thought: brilliant. What a f*** genius. But then, hollywood ass-grabbers decided to cast him on non-douche roles... Just to set things straight... R5 is not a CAM rip it is a Region 5 DVD rip, the audio is CAM audio. So this is a R5 DVD with CAM audio. Whoever you people are who just invented the new term R5 Cam in your heads... Do some reading, educate yourselves. And also, this is MATiNE's release uploaded by scene4all as noted in the info pane.
